MY BEST!!!! FOR A FIRST ATTEMPT! [img]http://www.rs2legendz.com/upload/uploads/20071012182025First%20sig%20wave.jpg[/img]
Rate out of 10, And say which is best Tell me where i can possibly do better

item.title: My first sig Rate
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

Personally, I would give that a 3/10
But since it’s your first, 7/10.

Nice dude, your on your way to become a good graphics designer.

Edit: it’d be better off without the text, it’s ugly

Read full topic

item.title: My first sig Rate
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

If you don’t like their C&C, I’ll do it and piss you off:
Background:
A simple lensflare and gradient map looks horrible. Never use a lensflare unless you actually know what in the hell your doing with it. Just putting it there is not good enough.
Text:
Your text is one of the most attention grabbing things on this. The text of your name is to brand it, not stand out as a part of the piece(unless it is a piece of it, which I doubt you would do).
Lighting:
You lighting makes no sense and makes it look faker than it already is.
C4D:
Whats with that random C4D? Its the only thing in it that has color and its the only thing that appeals to me.
Clipping mask:
What the fuck? Who told you people that adding a fucking clipping mask that size of Texas in the middle of your signature looked hawt? Tell me so I can shoot him.
Negative space:
Too much of it.
Focal point:
Is the lensflare. … Don’t use lensflares if you don’t know how. gg.

Now, drop this project and start something new because you wont be able to improve this. All your doing is making it look worse.

Read full topic

item.title: My first sig Rate
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

Alright so HOW to give C&C!

  1. Look at the art piece! study it, LEARN it, because that is what your commenting on!

  2. Try and find what style the person is going for, whether it be abstract, grunge ect…

  3. Filter Your Thoughts… First thing that will come to your mind is “UGLY” or something so think about what your gonna say!

  4. Rate and comment the piece accordingly! Look for flow, depth, contrast, color flow, render choice, c4d usage… and so on.

  5. If its a beginner piece, then tell him to read some handy tutorials! give links ect! remember we all have to start somewhere!

  6. Be Polite, kind, helpful ect…

So this is pretty much it! here are some handy tips…

From the c&c Topic read it.

Read full topic

Theres something I don’t quite understand.

Is there a memo I missed that states everybody’s first sig must include a huge lens flare, that is completely irrelevant to the rest of the sig? Not only that, but its the only thing on your background. wtf?
